page.title: 14The Quedam,Yeovil.
page.content: The Quedam was started in 1983 & today Phase 1 is open.Of 33 shops, about half are operating & the rest are let.The unfinished part,Phase 2,will be operating by August 1985. The shops form an attractive street(for pedestrians only).They are serviced from a lower level by means of 8 lifts.Vehicles delivering goods below'ground'level ,are observed by CCTV Cameras(which also aid security), & their access controlled by traffic lights. Although the area is attractive & convenient,it doesn't seem to attract many shoppers.This may be because there is no great variety of shops.Among the 22 shops now open,5 are ladies' fashions, & 4 are mens' fashions.There is also a shoe shop & a jewellers.
